title: DJ Fred
description: Will Minnie’s lustful ways get her in to even darker and sexier situations?Minnie seems to be the typical lonely wife. Her husband’s a successful business man who’s always traveling and working late. Minnie is anything but ordinary however, she’s a nymphomaniac completely sexually frustrated without a willing and daring partner at her beck and call.Everything changes one day when Minnie meets a sexy DJ she just can’t say no to. When she’s caught in her indiscretion by her husband, Minnie finds herself out on the street. While away from home, Minnie experiences exciting, daring and sexy adventures she could only dream of!Erotica author EJ Benard’s, 'DJ Fred' is a smoldering tale of a lonely wife looking for a thrill that will make all erotica fans hot!
author: E.J. Benard
